snippet: The site, which Hilton created with Onion Labs, lets users diagnose their vacation needs and receive prescriptions for visits to Hilton hotels.
abstract: Jane L Lavere Advertising column notes Hilton Hotels and Resorts has joined forces with satirical news Web site the Onion to create tongue-in-cheek Web site that 'prescribes' vacations at Hilton locations; points out campaign targets stressed-out, younger professionals.
lead_paragraph: The site, which Hilton created with Onion Labs, lets users diagnose their vacation needs and receive prescriptions for visits to Hilton hotels.

headline.seo: Hilton Site Prescribes Vacations for Workers’ Ills
headline.main: A Hilton Web Site Prescribes Vacations for Workers’ Ills
headline.print_headline: A Hilton Web Site Prescribes Vacations for Workers’ Ills
